Review: Positive experienceI spoke with Nurse Ms E. Waugh and I found her to be very knowledgeable, friendly and extremely helpful. I have been made to feel at ease with my weight loss journey and I feel very supported.

Exactly what I needed!The system in place is straightforward to use and information is easy to access and understand. The nurse practitioner I spoke with was friendly, extremely knowledgeable, and eager to answer the specific questions I had about my personal circumstances; she was very professional and not judgmental at all. I'll definitely continue using the service!

Thorough Health Check before Weight Loss drugsPhone call on time, very thorough and explanations were given with each answer. Although I was not offered the weight loss drug I would of liked, I understand the doctor's reason. Thank you for being caring and honest and thorough with your questioning of my existing health issues.

So simple and convenientI have been using Youly for almost one year now. I'm really happy with how easy it is to schedule a telehealth appointment and they always ring on time. Knowledgeable practitioners and simple sending of scripts which I then pay online and have sent by courier to my home. It's hassle free and reliable and I love that.

The results were worth itI have been using Youly for a year to help achieve my weight loss goal. Menopause kicked in and I put on quite a bit of weight which would not budge no matter how much I exercised/watched what I ate. After a phone consultation, my doctor and nurse practitioner come up with a plan to help. Weekly injections, monthly phone follow-ups and regular emails telling me what to expect helped me achieve my goal weight. I cannot speak highly enough of the team looking after me and the follow-up still happening. If you're considering trying Youly for your weight loss I recommend contacting them to discuss your options. I sat on the fence for six months before I made the commitment. The end result was worth the time and money.

Never available - don’t use for regular appointmentsI need to have monthly appointments but the team never have appointments available and when they do they move them, then I jump in a queue to get an appointment wait over 5 hours and I’m no longer able to take a personal medical call as I’m not waiting in my living room for 5 hours

BEST ONLINE HEALTHCARE EVERI decided to go through Youly for contraception methods for the first time and the doctor was very informative in my consultation and provided thorough explanations on which pill would be best suited to me and why.
